thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 11 of 25
thread.title: Ian Hutchinson and Shane Guiry
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Ian Hutchinson and Shane Guiry

author: Ian Hutchinson and Shane Guiry
title: Ian Hutchinson and Shane Guiry
text: Since day one, I've had no issues or problems with customer service having been in touch a few times. The online systems is really good with enabling tracking of energy use and bills etc. Makes it easier to control and monitor bills. What more could you want?
